about_the_game:
Experience the most exciting map expansion for CTS: Tram yet! Depot & Southern-Route Add-On contains:

  • Tram depot with a loop circuit, storage halls, two sidetracks, manual branching switches, and two access points.

  • Four new stations with multiple stops, including a new end-station with a drive-through track.

  • Two new access points to the expanded area:

    • Northern access between Rathausplatz, Unterer Ring, and Igor-Yurkevic-Platz.

    • Southeastern access between Eglundsdorf, Löwenstraße, and Stadtgraben.

The add-on also contains some nice aesthetics features for you enjoy, including:

  • Large construction site with skyscrapers.

  • Japanese garden.

  • Shopping streets with Asian-themed shops.

  • Green-strip track sections

Experience the most exciting map expansion for CTS: Tram yet! Depot & Southern-Route Add-On contains:

The add-on also contains some nice aesthetics features for you enjoy, including:
